name: Heavenly Magic Almond Nougat
description: Heavenly Magic Almond Nougat is a Rich premium Dairy, Butter Scotch ice cream with Almond Nougat. It is made from 100% Sri Lankan Fresh Cow's milk. Suitable for Vegetarians. Rs. 50 cents from every 1L of fresh milk collected is contributed to a special welfare fund "Sarubima" focused on empowering Farmers children through education.      *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
